overview: This is a story of brothers in Japan. The younger brother hires a girl to help the disabled older brother with jacking off, but when both of them fall in love with the helper... A medium length film directed by Yuki Kuwazuru and starring Kunihiro Koyama and Kosuke Komura, PFF (Pia Film Festival) Award 2013 2nd stage nominee
title: (Not) Perfect Human
